name: whitecottagefloral
description: White Cottage Floral Design - Static Website

scripts.watch: node -e "require('fs').watchFile('data.json', () => { require('child_process').exec('node build.js', console.log); }); require('fs').watchFile('index.template.html', () => { require('child_process').exec('node build.js', console.log); }); console.log('Watching for changes...');"
